API Reference¶

The following section outlines the API of pyxkcd.

Note

If you get a ModuleNotFoundError when trying to import pyxkcd, check Installation

Version Related Info¶

xkcd.__version__¶

A string representation of the version. e.g. '0.0.1'. This is based off of PEP 440.

Clients¶

Client¶

Attributes
  • current
  • session
Methods
  • defget
  • deflatest
  • defrandom
class xkcd.Client¶

Represents a client that can be used to interact with the xkcd API. This class is used to interact with the xkcd API.

session¶

The session used to make requests to the xkcd API.

Type

httpx.Client

current¶

The current comic number.

Type

int

get(comic)¶

Gets a comic from the xkcd API.

Parameters

comic (int) – The comic number to get.

Return type

Comic

latest()¶

Gets the latest comic from the xkcd API.

Return type

Comic

random()¶

Gets a random comic from the xkcd API.

Return type

Comic

AsyncClient¶

Attributes
  • current
  • session
Methods
  • defclose
  • asyncget
  • asynclatest
  • asyncrandom
class xkcd.AsyncClient¶

An asynchronous version of the Client class.

session¶

The session used to make requests to the xkcd API.

Type

httpx.AsyncClient

current¶

The current comic number.

Type

int

await get(comic)¶

Gets a comic from the xkcd API.

Parameters

comic (int) – The comic number to get.

Return type

Comic

await latest()¶

Gets the latest comic from the xkcd API.

Return type

Comic

await random()¶

Gets a random comic from the xkcd API.

Return type

Comic

close()¶

Closes the http session. Can be called manually, but is also called when the object is garbage collected.

Comic¶

Comic¶

Attributes
  • image
  • num
  • released
  • title
  • transcript
class xkcd.Comic(response)¶

Represents a xkcd comic.

released¶

The date the comic was released.

Type

datetime.datetime

title¶

The title of the comic.

Type

str

num¶

The number of the comic.

Type

int

transcript¶

The transcript of the comic.

Type

str

image¶

The image of the comic.

Type

Image

Image¶

Image¶

Attributes
  • alt
  • url
class xkcd.Image(url, alt)¶

Represents an image from the xkcd API.

url¶

The URL of the image.

Type

str

alt¶

The alt text of the image.

Type

str

Exceptions¶

The following exceptions are thrown by the library.

exception xkcd.errors.XkcdError¶

Bases: Exception

Base class for exceptions in this module.

exception xkcd.errors.InvalidComicError¶

Bases: xkcd.errors.XkcdError

Exception raised for errors caused by non-existent comics.

Exception Hierarchy¶

  • Exception
    • xkcd.errors.XkcdError

      • xkcd.errors.InvalidComicError
